facades

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facades.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    The CustomerFacade class is used by the customer users of the CouponSystem. It grants them access to all of the relevant methods for their uses.
